member.name: T:WillPower.FileFieldBase
member.summary: A common base class containing the necessary properties and methods for processing a single field. Must be inherited.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileFieldBase.Encoder
member.summary: The IFileParserEncoder instance to use for encoding.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileFieldBase.StartPosition
member.summary: The starting position of this field in the record expressed as an unsigned integer.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileFieldBase.Length
member.summary: The field length expressed as an unsigned integer.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileFieldBase.Name
member.summary: The name of the field.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileFieldBase.DataFormat
member.summary: The format of the field. String = 0, Comp3 (IBM Packed Number) = 1, Raw (binary) = 2.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileFieldBase.Value
member.summary: The computed value boxed as an object.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileFieldBase.Type
member.summary: The type of data the field contains.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileFieldBase.Precision
member.summary: The precision of the value if decimal.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileFieldBase.YearFirst
member.summary: If true and the DataFormat is set to String (0), will attempt to read the date value with year at the beginning.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileFieldBase.ByteValue
member.summary: The original, source Encoded array of bytes belonging to this field.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileFieldBase.StringValue
member.summary: The computed result as a string.

member.name: M:WillPower.FileFieldBase.#ctor
member.summary: .ctor. Must be inherited.

member.name: M:WillPower.FileFieldBase.#ctor(WillPower.IFileField)
member.summary: .ctor. Must be inherited.
member.param: The source field to clone.

member.name: M:WillPower.FileFieldBase.#ctor(WillPower.IFileParserEncoder,System.Type,System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,WillPower.FileFieldDataFormat)
member.summary: .ctor. Must be inherited.
member.param: The IFileParserEncoder instance to use for encoding.
The type of data the field contains.
The name of the field.
The starting position of this field in the record expressed as an unsigned integer.
The field length expressed as an unsigned integer.
The format of the field.

member.name: M:WillPower.FileFieldBase.#ctor(WillPower.IFileParserEncoder,System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,WillPower.FileFieldDataFormat,System.Byte,System.Boolean)
member.summary: .ctor. Must be inherited. Used for numeric (decimal) types.
member.param: The IFileParserEncoder instance to use for encoding.
The name of the field.
The starting position of this field in the record expressed as an unsigned integer.
The field length expressed as an unsigned integer.
The format of the field.
The precision of the expected resultant as Byte. Default is 0. The limitation is from logical reasons.
If true, throw a on a null result.

member.name: M:WillPower.FileFieldBase.#ctor(WillPower.IFileParserEncoder,System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,WillPower.FileFieldDataFormat,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: .ctor. Must be inherited. Used for Date types.
member.param: The IFileParserEncoder instance to use for encoding.
The name of the field.
The starting position of this field in the record expressed as an unsigned integer.
The field length expressed as an unsigned integer.
The format of the field.

If true it assumes the year is the first part of the string. Default is false. Note: If the string contains a parsable date character ( / or - ) it will attempt to use TryParse and return any successful result. If TryParse fails it proceeds on to string parsing.
If true, throw a on a null result.

member.name: M:WillPower.FileFieldBase.Compute(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Computes this provided array of bytes using the properties provided.
member.param: The array of bytes to process.

member.name: T:WillPower.FileParserBase
member.summary: A common base class for a file parsing engine. Must be inherited.

member.summary: The list of tasks currently active or not yet disposed.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileParserBase.Threads
member.summary: The managing TaskFactory for parallel execution.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileParserBase.IsConditional
member.summary: Gets a quick determination on whether a collection of conditions exist.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileParserBase.Records
member.summary: The collection of records read from the file. Must be implemented.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileParserBase.MaximumConcurrency
member.summary: The default TaskScheduler of the TaskFactory's MaximumConcurrencyLevel as an unsigned integer.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileParserBase.Layout
member.summary: The layout of the file, including any header, footer, or conditional rows.

member.name: T:WillPower.FileFieldDataFormat
member.summary: Enumeration for field data format.

member.name: F:WillPower.FileFieldDataFormat.String
member.summary: The value is an encoded string.

member.name: F:WillPower.FileFieldDataFormat.Comp3
member.summary: The value is packed using the IBM Packed Data Format.

member.name: F:WillPower.FileFieldDataFormat.Raw
member.summary: The value is raw binary.

member.name: T:WillPower.Extensions
member.summary: Container for extension methods.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromPackedBool(System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns true if the byte has value > 0 in the second nibble. IBM Packed Decimal Format.
member.param: The byte to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromPackedShort(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the short value of the packed number or 0. IBM Packed Decimal Format.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromPackedInt(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the int value of the packed number or 0. IBM Packed Decimal Format.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromPackedLong(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the long value of the packed number or 0. IBM Packed Decimal Format.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromPackedUShort(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the unsigned short value of the packed number or 0. IBM Packed Decimal Format.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromPackedUInt(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the unsigned int value of the packed number or 0. IBM Packed Decimal Format.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromPackedULong(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the unsigned long value of the packed number or 0. IBM Packed Decimal Format.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromPackedDouble(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the double value of the packed number or 0. IBM Packed Decimal Format.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromPackedDate(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the DateTime value of the packed number or null. Note: The byte array must be 2 or 4 bytes long.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate. Length must be 2 (Short Date Format) or 4 (Long Date Format).

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromComp3(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Used internally to convert nibbles to digits and return a number without evaluating 0th nibble for flags, a.k.a., every nibble is included in the result. Critical to PackedDate conversion. Used in byte[].FromPackedDate().
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromPackedDecimal(System.Byte[],System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns the decimal value of the packed number. IBM Packed Decimal Format.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate. System.InvalidCastException results from null or empty byte array.

The precision of the expected resultant as Byte. Default is 0. The limitation is from logical reasons. Obviously negative values are not supported and should be handled through the decimal.Raise(double) extension method or your own code (10 raised to precision * value).

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromRawDate(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the DateTime value of the byte array or null. It is assumed the bytes store a DateTime value encoded directly.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromRawDecimal(System.Byte[],System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns the decimal value of the byte array.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate. System.InvalidCastException results from null or empty byte array.

The precision of the expected resultant as Byte. Default is 0. The limitation is from logical reasons. Obviously negative values are not supported and should be handled through the decimal.Raise(double) extension method or your own code (10 raised to precision * value).

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromRawShort(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the short value of the byte array or 0.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromRawInt(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the int value of the byte array or 0.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromRawLong(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the long value of the byte array or 0.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromRawDouble(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the double value of the byte array or 0.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromRawUShort(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the unsigned short value of the byte array or 0.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromRawUInt(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the unsigned int value of the byte array or 0.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.FromRawULong(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns the unsigned long value of the byte array or 0.
member.param: The array of bytes to evaluate.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ReadNext(System.IO.Stream,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Reads the stream for the specified number of bytes or null.
member.param: The stream to read from.
The number of bytes to read expressed as an unsigned integer.
member.returns: An array of bytes from the stream or null.

member.name: M:WillPower.Extensions.ReadToChar(System.IO.Stream,System.Char,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Reads the stream up to the specified character.
member.param: The stream to read from.
The end of line char.
The optional destination Encoding or UTF8.
member.returns: An array of bytes from the stream or null.

member.name: T:WillPower.FileLayout
member.summary: The layout of the file, including any header, footer, or conditional rows. For binary files the RecordLength must be greater than 0. For text files the default TextLineTerminator is '\n' (nextline), but can be set at any time. Implements IFileLayout. Cannot be inherited.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileLayout.Encoder
member.summary: The IFileParserEncoder instance to use for encoding.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileLayout.Conditions
member.summary: The collection of conditions to evaulate each record for (and apply those fields if true), if any.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileLayout.HeaderRecord
member.summary: The Header record template, if any.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileLayout.FooterRecord
member.summary: The Footer record template, if any.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileLayout.MasterFields
member.summary: The collection of fields containing either master key fields (3D file), or all fields (2D file).

member.name: P:WillPower.FileLayout.RecordLength
member.summary: The length of each record expressed as an unsigned integer.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileLayout.OpenAsText
member.summary: If true, open using character-based methods. If false, open using binary methods.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileLayout.TextLineTerminator
member.summary: The character used to determine end of line when OpenAsText is true. For text files the default is '\n' (nextline), but can be set at any time.

member.summary: .ctor. Creates a new instance of FileLayout.

member.summary: .ctor. Creates a new instance of FileLayout.

member.name: T:WillPower.FileParserEncoder
member.summary: A concrete class for containing the necessary Encoding properties to parse a file.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileParserEncoder.SourceEncoding
member.summary: The Encoding the anticipated input is in. Default is EBCDIC, or IBM AS/400 binary and text encoding.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileParserEncoder.DestinationEncoding
member.summary: The Encoding the expected output should be in. Default is UTF8.

member.name: P:WillPower.FileParserEncoder.EBCDIC
member.summary: The EBCDIC Encoding for easy reference. This is usually the IBM 037 code page in .Net. Default is CodePage IBM037.

member.name: P:WillPower.IO.FileParser.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WillPower.IO.FileParser.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:WillPower.IO.FileParser.Properties.Resources.InvalidLength
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Length is invalid for this operation..

member.name: P:WillPower.IO.FileParser.Properties.Resources.OverFlow
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Provided value would result in a stack overflow..
